artefact: Search the bankruptcy and insolvency register

artefact.overview: Search the Individual Insolvency Register for details about bankruptcy orders, Debt Relief Orders, Individual Voluntary Arrangements and Fast-track Voluntary Arrangements
artefact.introduction:
Get details about the following insolvency cases for people in England and Wales: 

+ Bankruptcies - for example, the date you'll be discharged (freed) from your debts
+ Debt Relief Orders
+ Fast-track or Individual Voluntary Arrangements 
+ Bankruptcy and Debt Relief Restrictions Orders and Undertakings

details.description: Includes bankruptcy, business finance and recovering debt
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
Includes recovering debts, registering for bankruptcy and as a creditor
Legal processes, courts and the police

artefact.title: Options for paying off your debts
